Black Widow

Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

Director Cate Shortland

Writers Eric Pearson,Jac Schaeffer, Ned Benson

Stars Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Tony McCarthy, Madeleine Nicholls, Michelle Lee, Shawarah Battles

Genre Action, Adventure, Drama, Thriller

Duration 134 min

Country United States of America

Production Trixter Film, Digital Domain, Zak Productions, Cinesite, Stereo D, Industrial Light & Magic, Marvel Studios, Clear Angle Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
